text: In mathematics, resolvent meaning "that which resolves" may refer to: * Resolvent formalism in operator theory * Resolvent set in operator theory, the set of points where an operator is "well-behaved" * Feller process#Resolvent in probability theory * Resolvent (Galois theory) of an equation for a permutation group, in particular: ** Resolvent quadratic of a cubic equation ** Resolvent cubic of a quartic equation In logic: * Resolvent (logic), the clause produced by a resolution * In the consensus theorem, the term produced by a consensus in Boolean logic
title: Resolvent
